name: journey (itch) (yohannzoh)
description:
So basically, after I watched Steven Spielberg's Ready Player One, i wanted to make a video game... I had already made some i the past but I have also deleted all of them... So what I wanted this time was to make one that I would keep somewhere...
That's how I started creating this 1979 Adventure-like game and now, because I'm too lazy, I don't know if I will ever finish making it so I put it here...
